MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:42pm. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:57pm on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
